Author: MissNietzsche
Text: Yeah, I had extreme hunger for like two months last summer when I quit purging. I too gained 15 pounds then.  I went through a mini phase just now as well. Gaining 5 pounds in a week after b/p'ing for almost a month.  I hate bulimia lmao. I'm just going to restrict now and try not to binge :') There's no point to losing weight through bulimia if we just binge it back due to extreme hunger

Author: PieldeSapo
Text: I've also had a similar experience, stuck in binge mode for weeks, literally eating from the moment I woke up to the moment i went to bed with the time in between meals just feeling anxious about not having food in my mouth. Then one day I'd wake up and have zero interest in food and I could go a full day without thinking of food or feeling hungry. I'd like to know.
